ai-kv1.6:90.5_0: “Mendicants, whatever form there is—whether past, present, or future, internal or external, gross or subtle, inferior or superior, near or far—it should all be seen with right wisdom according to reality like this:
ai-kv1.6:90.6_0: This is called the bodily-form component.
ai-kv1.6:90.7_0: Any kind of feeling at all ...
ai-kv1.6:90.9_0: Any kind of choices at all ...
ai-kv1.6:90.10_0: Whatever consciousness there is—whether past, present, or future, internal or external, gross or subtle, inferior or superior, near or far—it should all be seen with right wisdom according to reality like this:
ai-kv1.6:90.14_0: for that is in the past and future:
ai-kv1.6:91.4_0: “Mendicants, there are these three scopes of language, terminology, and descriptions. They’re uncorrupted, as they have been since the beginning. They’re not being corrupted now, nor will they be. Sensible ascetics and brahmins don’t look down on them.
ai-kv1.6:91.6_0: When form has passed, ceased, and perished, its designation, label, and description is ‘was’.
ai-kv1.6:91.10_0: Any kind of choices at all ...
ai-kv1.6:91.11_0: consciousness has passed, ceased, and perished, its designation, label, and description is ‘was’.
ai-kv1.6:92.1_0: When form is not yet born, and has not yet appeared, its designation, label, and description is ‘will be’.
ai-kv1.6:92.5_0: Any kind of choices at all ...
ai-kv1.6:92.6_0: consciousness is not yet born, and has not yet appeared, its designation, label, and description is ‘will be’.
ai-kv1.6:93.1_0: When form has been born, and has appeared, its designation, label, and description is ‘is’.
ai-kv1.6:93.5_0: Any kind of choices at all ...
ai-kv1.6:93.6_0: consciousness has been born, and has appeared, its designation, label, and description is ‘is’.
ai-kv1.6:93.8_0: These are the three scopes of language, terminology, and descriptions. They’re uncorrupted, as they have been since the beginning. They’re not being corrupted now, nor will they be. Sensible ascetics and brahmins don’t look down on them.
ai-kv1.6:94.1_0: Even those wanderers of the past, Vassa and Bhañña of Ukkalā, who taught the doctrines of no-cause, inaction, and nihilism, didn’t imagine that these three scopes of language should be criticized or rejected.
ai-kv1.6:94.3_0: For fear of blame, attack, and condemnation.”
ai-kv1.6:95.1_0: In the past, there are past.
ai-kv1.6:95.4_0: “Sir, suppose someone were to describe the Buddhas of the past who have become completely extinguished, cut off proliferation, cut off the track, finished off the cycle, and transcended suffering. Does the eye exist by which they could be described?
ai-kv1.6:95.6_0: Does the mind exist by which they could be described?”
ai-kv1.6:96.1_0: “Phagguna, suppose someone were to describe the Buddhas of the past who have become completely extinguished, cut off proliferation, cut off the track, finished off the cycle, and transcended suffering. The eye does not exist by which they could be described.
ai-kv1.6:96.3_0: Does the mind exist by which they could be described?”
ai-kv1.6:97.1_0: In the past, there are past.
ai-kv1.6:97.4_0: “Formerly, greed, which is unskillful. Now there is none, so that’s skillful.
ai-kv1.6:97.5_0: Formerly there was hate, which was unskillful. Now there is none,
ai-kv1.6:97.6_0: Formerly there was delusion, which was unskillful. Now there is none, so that’s skillful.”
ai-kv1.6:98.5_0: “Mendicants, if there is desire, relishing, and craving for solid food, there is craving for solid food.
ai-kv1.6:98.6_0: consciousness is established and grows there.
ai-kv1.6:98.7_0: Where consciousness is established and grows, name and form are conceived.
ai-kv1.6:98.8_0: Where name and form are conceived, there is the growth of choices.
ai-kv1.6:98.9_0: Where choices grow, there is rebirth into a new state of existence in the future.
ai-kv1.6:98.10_0: Where there is rebirth into a new state of existence in the future, there is rebirth, old age, and death in the future.
ai-kv1.6:98.11_0: Where there is rebirth, old age, and death in the future, I say this is full of sorrow, anguish, and distress.
ai-kv1.6:99.1_0: If there is no desire, relishing, and craving for contact as fuel ...
ai-kv1.6:99.2_0: If there is no desire, relishing, and craving for mental intention as fuel ...
ai-kv1.6:99.3_0: If there is desire, relishing, and craving for consciousness as fuel ...
ai-kv1.6:99.7_0: for he has come to us.
ai-kv1.6:100.4_0: “Mendicants, if there is no desire, relishing, and craving for solid food, there is no craving for solid food.
ai-kv1.6:100.6_0: Where consciousness is not established, there is no name and form.
ai-kv1.6:100.7_0: Where name and form are not conceived, there is no growth of choices.
ai-kv1.6:100.8_0: Where choices don’t grow, there is no rebirth into a new state of existence in the future.
ai-kv1.6:100.9_0: Where there is no rebirth into a new state of existence in the future, there is no rebirth, old age, and death in the future.
ai-kv1.6:100.10_0: Where there is no rebirth, old age, and death in the future, I say there’s no sorrow, anguish, and distress.
ai-kv1.6:101.1_0: If there is no desire, relishing, and craving for contact as fuel ...
ai-kv1.6:101.2_0: If there is no desire, relishing, and craving for mental intention as fuel ...
ai-kv1.6:101.3_0: If there is no desire, relishing, and craving for consciousness as fuel ...
ai-kv1.6:101.9_0: The account of all rapture is finished.
